channel.title: 软件使用 on
channel.description: Recent content in 软件使用 on

item.title: frp内网穿透
item.description: FRP内网穿透 # https://github.com/fatedier/frp/ https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.61.1/frp_0.61.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz 服务端 # wget https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.61.1/frp_0.61.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz tar -zxvf frp_0.61.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz --transform="s|frp_0.61.1_linux_amd64|frp|g" ./frp/frps -c ./frp/frps.toml 客户端 # 因服务端不在127.0.0.1,直接替换(未备案的域名可能被拦截无法访问,最好用IP) 测试 ssh ali.mm -p 6000 修改后缀.toml为.ini可以不输入参数 sed -i 's|serverAddr = "127.0.0.1"|serverAddr = "ali.mm"|g' ./frp/frpc.toml ./frp/frpc -c ./frp/frpc.toml 免费FRP # 免费网站https://freefrp.com/ frpc.toml 启动: #./frpc -c frpc.toml 网页 http://public.freefrp.org:59876 serverAddr = "public.freefrp.org" auth.token = "public.freefrp.com" serverPort = 8000 [[proxies]] name = "uzicjb" type = "tcp" localIP = "6.mm" localPort = 80 remotePort = 59876

item.title: goaccess日志分析
item.description: goaccess # 安装 # apt install -y goaccess sed -i '$a log-format COMBINED' /etc/goaccess/goaccess.conf 生成页面 # goaccess /var/log/nginx/access.log -o 1.html
wget使用 # 下载所有能遍历的目录及文件(爬虫) # wget -r -np -nH -R index.html http://127.0.0.1/ #
